title: New: Human Human – Lips
content:
Having first met during their high school years, Montreal quartet Human Human have taken their time over the past couple of years, perfecting and honing their song writing skills.

Debut offering, Lips, is a slickly produced, anthemic number; all pulsating synths and a Brandon Flowers-esque lead vocal, culminating in a massive singalong, it’s one of this years most impressive new tracks. More than anything, it reminds me of The Cure, and that’s ALWAYS a good thing.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
